Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Brockbank Junior High School

Granite School District, Magna, Utah

Principal: Terri VanWinkle

Brockbank Junior High School's website

About Brockbank Junior High School

School background
Brockbank Junior was built in 1949-50. About 50 percent of our students ride buses to/from school.

Enrollment
Current population 946
67% Caucasian
23% Hispanic
1% Native American
2% Asian
4% Pacific Islander
1% African American

Computers and Technology
Brockbank Junior High has 4 computer labs and 6 wireless minilabs in classrooms. Students have access to computers for research in the media center. Brockbank is wired for computer networking and has at least one computer in every classroom.

Student promotion
Our students will attend Cyprus High School. We do not have a formal 9th grade promotion program. We do provide a 9th grade end-of-year activity.

Principal
Terri VanWinkle

Assistant Principal
Lois Elkington

School Calendar
Traditional nine-month

School hours
Starts Mon-Fri 7:50 a.m.,br /> Ends Mon-Thu 2:45 p.m.
Ends Fri 12:30 p.m.

Lunch hour
1st lunch 10:35 - 11:05
2nd lunch 12:00 â€“ 12:30

Registration
Registration information for the coming school year is mailed to incoming seventh, eighth and ninth grade students in July.

School motto
"On Time, On Task, On Target!"

Extracurricular programs
We offer volleyball, basketball, soccer, wrestling, golf, and track in the sports area. We have a strong intramural program. We have student officers and cheerleaders. The students may also choose to be involved with our academic team.
